trans-unit.source: Represents the AuthnStatement element specified in [Saml2Core, 2.7.2].
trans-unit.target: 表示在 [Saml2Core, 2.7.2] 中指定的 AuthnStatement 元素。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the element that this class represents, see the SAML V2.0 Core specification.
trans-unit.target: 有关此类表示的元素的详细信息，请参阅 SAML 2.0 版核心规范。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AuthenticationStatement" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AuthenticationStatement" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The authentication context of this statement.
trans-unit.target: 该声明的身份验证上下文。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AuthenticationStatement" /> class with the specified authentication context and the current time as the authentication instant.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的身份验证上下文和作为身份验证时刻的当前时间初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AuthenticationStatement" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AuthenticationStatement.AuthenticationInstant%2A> property is set to <xref:System.DateTime.UtcNow%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AuthenticationStatement.AuthenticationInstant%2A> 属性设置为 <xref:System.DateTime.UtcNow%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="authenticationContext" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="authenticationContext" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The authentication context of this statement.
trans-unit.target: 该声明的身份验证上下文。

trans-unit.source: The time of the authentication.
trans-unit.target: 身份验证的时间。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AuthenticationStatement" /> class with the specified authentication context and authentication time.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的身份验证上下文和身份验证时间初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AuthenticationStatement" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="authenticationContext" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="authenticationContext" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the context used by the authenticating authority up to and including the authentication event that yielded this statement.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置身份验证颁发机构使用的上下文和包含指示此语句的身份验证事件的上下文。

trans-unit.source: [Saml2Core, 2.7.2]
trans-unit.target: [Saml2Core, 2.7.2]

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AuthenticationContext" /> that represents the context.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示上下文的 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AuthenticationContext" />。

trans-unit.source: The AuthnContext element.
trans-unit.target: AuthnContext 元素中。

trans-unit.source: This element is required.
trans-unit.target: 需要此元素。

trans-unit.source: An attempt to set a value that is <see langword="null" /> occurs.
trans-unit.target: 尝试设置一个 <see langword="null" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the time at which the authentication took place.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置身份验证执行的时间。

trans-unit.source: [Saml2Core, 2.7.2]
trans-unit.target: [Saml2Core, 2.7.2]

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that represents the time of authentication in UTC.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />，表示 UTC 中的认证时间。

trans-unit.source: The AuthnInstant attribute.
trans-unit.target: AuthnInstant 属性中。

trans-unit.source: This attribute is required.
trans-unit.target: 该属性是必选项。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of a particular session between the principal identified by the subject and the authenticating authority.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置按主题标识的主体和身份验证颁发机构之间的特定会话的索引。

trans-unit.source: [Saml2Core, 2.7.2]
trans-unit.target: [Saml2Core, 2.7.2]

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the session index.
trans-unit.target: 包含会话索引的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The SessionIndex attribute.
trans-unit.target: SessionIndex 属性中。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the time instant at which the session between the principal identified by the subject and the SAML authority issuing this statement must be considered ended.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置必须考虑结束主体标识的主题和颁发此语句的 SAML 颁发机构之间的会话的时间。

trans-unit.source: [Saml2Core, 2.7.2]
trans-unit.target: [Saml2Core, 2.7.2]

trans-unit.source: Returns a nullable <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that represents the session expiration time in UTC.
trans-unit.target: 返回在 UTC 表示会话过期时间可以为 null 的 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="null" /> value indicates that the attribute is not specified.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示特性未指定的 <see langword="null" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The SessionNotOnOrAfter attribute.
trans-unit.target: SessionNotOnOrAfter 属性中。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the DNS domain name and IP address for the system from which the assertion subject was apparently authenticated.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置系统的 DNS 域名和 IP 地址，已从该系统中对断言主题进行了相似的身份验证。

trans-unit.source: [Saml2Core, 2.7.2]
trans-unit.target: [Saml2Core, 2.7.2]

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2SubjectLocality" /> that specifies the DNS domain name and IP address.
trans-unit.target: 指定 DNS 域名和 IP 地址的 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2SubjectLocality" />。

trans-unit.source: The SubjectLocality element.
trans-unit.target: SubjectLocality 元素中。
